# Add Return Type Annotations

## ðŸŸ¡ Medium Priority

### Summary
Many functions missing explicit return types.

### Implementation
```typescript
// Before
async function getOrganization(id: string) {
  return await db.organization.findUnique({ where: { id } });
}

// After
async function getOrganization(id: string): Promise<Organization | null> {
  return await db.organization.findUnique({ where: { id } });
}
```

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add return types to all exported functions
- [ ] Add return types to class methods
- [ ] Enable noImplicitReturns
- [ ] Document complex return types

### Estimated Effort
2-3 hours
